txt.en: You have struck the training-dummy with Burning Embers.
Your trainer wants you to use your new skills to prove that you are ready to face the many dangers that exist in the world.

'Welcome, [placeholder]. It is good to meet another who walks the path of wisdom, and I will gladly share my insight with you.

'As you grow in knowledge and ability, you will find that you will have many allies to call upon in your struggles. The birds and creatures of the land will lend you their strength. Even the strength of the very earth can be drawn upon, or the light from the sky. But today, I speak of one of your most dangerous companions: tongues of fire raised by hotly-burning embers of flame!

'Demonstrate your mastery by setting alight this training dummy with the power of your burning embers!'
Use the skill <rgb=#00ff00>Burning Embers</rgb> on the training-dummy nearby.
'Good, [placeholder]! I think you will be an excellent Lore-master someday. You should return now to Elladan; I believe he wishes to begin the investigation.'
The Lore-master Trainer is at the Edhelion Watch.\n\nNow that you have successfully used your newly-learned skill, you should return to your trainer and tell her of your success.
Dorongúr Whitethorn is in Edhelion.\n\nYou should make your way to Dorongúr Whitethorn and tell him that you have finished your meditation and have prepared yourself for battle.
Use the skill <rgb=#00ff00>Burning Embers</rgb> on the training-dummy nearby.

'Yes, I sensed that you were well-prepared, [placeholder]. Remember, we must work to reclaim this land and while we have a tentative peace with the dwarves in the valley below, we cannot overlook the lessons of the past and the betrayal that came at their hands.\n\n'Speak with Dorongúr and tell him that I believe you are ready.'
'I will teach you more when you are ready to learn. For the moment, you should speak with Dorongúr.'
Strike the training-dummy with Burning Embers
Talk to the Lore-master Trainer at the Edhelion Watch
Talk to Dorongúr Whitethorn in Edhelion
